Aberrant Shield Pattern Analysis.location: Obtained by scanning system authority and combat vessels, or as a mission reward.

Anomalous Bulk Scan Data.location: Obtained by scanning haulage vessels or as a mission reward.

Anomalous FSD Telemetry.location: Obtained by scanning frame shift high wakes of vessels or as a mission reward.
